messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Just a homemaker...Lisa Bugg's essay
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you, Leslie for finding and sending this Essay, it was brilliantly written and I love it! I m forwarding it to others. Warmly, Robin What we learn with
messages.messageBody:
Thank you, Leslie for finding and sending this Essay, it was brilliantly written and I love it! I'm forwarding it to others.
Warmly,
Robin

"What we learn with pleasure we never forget."
Alfred Mercier

I found Lisa's essay at unschooling.com of all places!

<A HREF="http://www.unschooling.com/library/essays/sowhatdo.shtml">Click here: So What Do You Do?</A>

Leslie
